content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ CIS Amazon EKS benchmark scanning now available June 12, 2024—With Trend Vision One – Container Security, compliance scanning with CIS benchmarks in your EKS clusters is seamless. Assess and guarantee adherence to industry-leading security standards effortlessly, enhancing your Kubernetes security posture. To learn more, see Compliance.
